KR: 성소에 경배를 드리자, 성소 주변에서 몬스터들이 마구 몰려나왔습니다! 성소가 오염되어 고기냄새를 맡은 몬스터들이 나타난 것 같습니다. 일단 이들을 물리치고, 오염된 성소를 정화하기 위한 방법을 찾아 봅시다.
EN: I'll give the worship in the sanctuary, monsters around sanctuary had gathered rolled! Sanctuary seems monster who has assumed the smell of contaminated meat appeared. Once you have defeated these, let's find a way to purify the contaminated sanctuary.
